name: Meerkats, Swarm
description: A swarm of medium-sized meerkats that can occupy the space of other creatures, striking in overwhelming numbers.
memorable: This swarm can restrict movement through its 'Corral' ability and is immune to many conditions.
goals: Overwhelm opponents and restrict movement while evading threats.
relations: Can be found with other animal swarms or in burrowing habitats.
environment: Typically found in open terrains or burrow systems.
strengths: Can occupy other creatures' spaces and effectively swarm, making it difficult for foes to escape.
weaknesses: Subpar strength making it weak in direct confrontations.
attacks: Utilizes a bite attack that deals significant piercing damage to its targets.
most_powerful_ability: The 'Corral' ability restricts creature movement and requires a saving throw to escape.
senses: Possesses keen sight, granting advantage on sight-related perception checks.
skills: Average perception abilities that allow the swarm to be attentive to its surroundings.
additional_information: Immunities to charmed, frightened, and several grapple-related conditions.
Ability to move through tight openings suitable for tiny creatures.
Can adapt to environments with poisonous threats due to 'Snake Hunter' ability.
test_queries: quirky beast swarm with keen sight
animal swarm that specializes in overwhelming foes
meerkat swarm biting and maneuvering tactics
